preProcess

void preProcess(IContext context)
                throws ThinklabException
This callback gets called before any process() command is called. It's a good place to load data, check the context and prepare for processing.

Parameters:
context -
Throws:
ThinklabException

postProcess

void postProcess(IContext context)
                 throws ThinklabException
This callback gets called after any process() command is called but before the first values are extracted. It's a good place to load data after transformations. Datasource must be ready to serve data in the given context after this is called.

Parameters:
context -
Throws:
ThinklabException

                      throws ThinklabException

Returns:
Throws:
ThinklabException - if the transformation cannot be handled.
